nio/SparkFun9DOF.description: Visit [SparkFun Block for Intel Edison - 9 Degrees of Freedom](https://www.sparkfun.com/products/13033) for more information. Sensors are read and a signal is emitted each time a signal is processed by the block. For more information on the LSM9DS0, view the [datasheet](https://cdn.sparkfun.com/assets/f/6/1/f/0/LSM9DS0.pdf).

default.description: Any list of signals to trigger sensor read.
A list of signals with the following attributes: accelerometer, magnetometer, gyroscope, temperature.
